resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73757</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73757</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-79e8-40de-2fcc-7e20b48e7348#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Junius Bassus kőkoporsója, 359 körül, Szent Péter-templom, Vatikán, szarkofág, márvány, dombormű.</string>
            <string language="en">Sarcophagus of Junius Bassus, ca. 359, Saint Peter's Church, Vatican, sarcophagus, marble, relief.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sarkophag von Junius Bassus, Ca. 359, 
Heiliger Peters Kirche, Vatican, Sarkophag, Marmor, Entlastung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sarcophage de Junius Bassus, ca. 359, 
église de Saint Peter, Vatican, sarcophage, marbre, 
soulagement.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sarcófago de Junius Bassus, ca. 359, igreja
de Saint Peter, Vatican, sarcófago, mármore, relevo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sarcophagus di Junius Bassus, ca. 359, 
chiesa del San Peter, Vatican, sarcophagus, marmo, rilievo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σαρκοφάγος Junius Bassus, περίπου 359, 
εκκλησία Αγίου Peter, Βατικανό, Σαρκοφάγος, μάρμαρο, 
ανακούφιση.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sarcófago de Junius Bassus, ca. 359, 
iglesia de Santo Peter, Vatican, sarcófago, mármol, relevación.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az egyik legszebb ókeresztény kori szarkofág, mely ó- és újtestamentumi jeleneteket ábrázol.</string>
            <string language="en">One of the most beautiful sarcophagus from the paleochristian era, which represents scenes from the Old and the New Testament</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókeresztény kor,  Junius Bassus,  dombrormű,  szarkofág,  </string>
            <string language="en">paleochristian era, Junius Bassus, relief, sarcophagus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein des schönsten Sarkophags von der paleochristian 
Ära, die Szenen vom alten und neuen Testament darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un du sarcophage le plus beau de l'ère paleochristian, 
qui représente des scènes du vieux et nouveau testament</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um do sarcófago o mais bonito da era paleochristian, que 
representa cenas do testament velho e novo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno del sarcophagus più bello dall'era paleochristian, 
che rappresenta le scene dal vecchio e nuovo Testamento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια από την ομορφότερη Σαρκοφάγο από τη 
paleochristian εποχή, η οποία αντιπροσωπεύει τις σκηνές από 
την παλαιά και νέα διαθήκη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uno del sarcófago más hermoso a partir de la era 
paleochristian, que representa escenas del viejo y nuevo testamento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">paleochristian Ära, Junius Bassus, Entlastung, 
Sarkophag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ère paleochristian, Junius Bassus, soulagement, 
sarcophage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">era paleochristian, Junius Bassus, relevo, sarcófago</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">era paleochristian, Junius Bassus, rilievo, sarcophagus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">paleochristian εποχή, Junius Bassus, ανακούφιση, 
Σαρκοφάγος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">era paleochristian, Junius Bassus, relevación, 
sarcófago</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73757</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
